headerData.name: Henri Hasler
headerData.title: Senior Web & Blockchain DEVELOPER
headerData.desciption: My biggest motivation? Just to keep challenging myself. I see life almost like one long University education — every day I’m learning something new.

aboutData.title: Who I am
aboutData.description1: My name's Henri. I'm a senior web and blockchain developer based in Bern, Switzerland.
aboutData.description2: A Senior Software Engineer specializing in distributed systems and Web3 technologies. I’ve launched multiple Ethereum Mainnet contracts, assisted with over 10 blockchain patent applications, created an NFT, and delivered MVPs. My expertise includes Web2 back-end services, data analysis, and work on multimillion-dollar projects. I enjoy system design and am adept at creating technical solutions around business use cases

content.projectDesc: This project aims to build an customer relationship management system with marketing automations including email, text, trackable video marketing, scheduling
This project aims to create a place to acquire leads, automate the workflow, manage contacts & video calls, transactions and more.
This project aims to build an advertising website for the BlendJet 2 portable blender and make Storybook
This is a simple online graphic design tool to create stunning images for any social media, flyers, logos, presentations, and more

achievementData.bio: Oversee 15+ web development projects for a global e-commerce company, manage a large-scale redesign project for the website, improve page speed by 15%, and incorporate user-centered design principles to increase average time on page from 52 seconds to one minute and twenty seconds
